column5: Anyone have any information on Last Mountain Lake such as fishing report on walleyes. Also any information on G&S Marina Outfitters at Last Moutain would be appreciated.

I have one second hand report. A friend was up there last week. I guess they got one ten pound waleye and nothing else. They fished two days and the wind chased them home. When I fished it myself, I would go in September and fish for northerns. Good luck. Larry
G&S is good folks. Rob and his lovely wife do a good job.
